creator: aturetta@bestunion.it
text:
In the default publication (clean build, revision 307273, no JCR), if you try to
publish the document 'OpenDocument Doctype' under 'Document Type Examples', you
get an exception:

The source
[lenya://lenya/pubs/default/content/authoring/doctypes/opendocument/index_en.xml]
does not exist!

org.apache.cocoon.ProcessingException: Error calling continuation at
file:/D:/Java/apache/lenya-1.4.x/build/lenya/webapp/lenya/usecases/usecases.js:249:-1
at <map:call> -
file:/D:/Java/apache/lenya-1.4.x/build/lenya/webapp/lenya/usecases/usecase.xmap:69:39
at <map:mount> -
file:/D:/Java/apache/lenya-1.4.x/build/lenya/webapp/lenya/usecase.xmap:56:128 at
<map:mount> -
file:/D:/Java/apache/lenya-1.4.x/build/lenya/webapp/global-sitemap.xmap:291:105
at <map:mount> -
file:/D:/Java/apache/lenya-1.4.x/build/lenya/webapp/sitemap.xmap:531:110

cause: org.apache.excalibur.source.SourceNotFoundException: The source
[lenya://lenya/pubs/default/content/authoring/doctypes/opendocument/index_en.xml]
does not exist!

creator: nettings@apache.org
text:
the same problem occurs when trying to delete the doctypes subtree from the
default publication:
http://localhost:8888/UniDuE-Design/authoring/doctypes_en.html?lenya.continuation=35652a695d83806574455c13222c0c686a13004b&lenya.usecase=site.delete&submit=Delete

there is an index_en.odt in there, so the doctype is probably ok, but the check
is not (it seems to assume an .xml file).
This works since the source extensions have been removed.
creator: andreas@apache.org
